text: William Kenneth Alphin (born November 1, 1963), best known by his stage name Big Kenny, is an American country music singer. He and John Rich comprise the duo Big & Rich, who recorded six studio albums and charted three singles on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details 2005 Live a Little * Release date: March 1, 2005 * Label: Hollywood Records 2009 The Quiet Times of a Rock and Roll Farm Boy * Release date: November 10, 2009 * Label: Glotown Records, Love Everybody, Bigger Picture Music Group 2017 Electro Shine * Release date: January 20, 2017 * Label: Glotown Records ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Country musicians from Virginia Category:21st-century American singer-songwriters
title: Big Kenny
